title: Let’s support BALDMAN!
body:
As you may know by my repacks, many of latest Denuvo-protected games were cracked not by CPY, but by a person calling himself BALDMAN. NieR Automata, Prey, Sniper: Ghost Warrior 3 and now RiME. The guy is like a one-man-CPY, which is great! Also, his support of Prey, in example, shows, how fast he can crack updated Denuvo protection versions.

In his supporting .NFO file he humbly asks for donations if you people wants him to release more and more cracks for Denuvo games. So yes, send him some bitcoin’s satoshis to this wallet:

15fxay2J19CZeZHGg1xrwhbQLU37RAhwzN

I will.
